settings.custom_liquid: <script type="text/javascript">var _learnq = _learnq || [];  var classname = document.getElementsByClassName("product-form__submit psuedo_none button button--full-width button--primary");var addToCart = function() {_learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', item]);}; for (var i = 0; i < classname.length; i++) {classname[i].addEventListener('click', addToCart, false);}</script>
